trans-unit.source: Unable to process certificate "{name}". Only PEM encoded X.509 files are supported.
trans-unit.target: Unable to process certificate "{name}". Only PEM encoded X.509 files are supported.

trans-unit.source: Unable to process certificate. Only PEM encoded X.509 files are supported.
trans-unit.target: Unable to process certificate. Only PEM encoded X.509 files are supported.

trans-unit.source: Unable to process private key. Only PEM encoded X.509 files are supported.
trans-unit.target: Unable to process private key. Only PEM encoded X.509 files are supported.

trans-unit.source: The certificate does not match with the provided private-key.
trans-unit.target: The certificate does not match with the provided private-key.

trans-unit.source: The certificate was signed using the weak "{provided}" algorithm. Expected at least algorithm "{expected}".".
trans-unit.target: The certificate was signed using the weak "{provided}" algorithm. Expected at least algorithm "{expected}".".

trans-unit.source: The private-key bits-size {provided} is too low. Expected at least {expected} bits.
trans-unit.target: The private-key bits-size {provided} is too low. Expected at least {expected} bits.

trans-unit.source: The certificate with serial-number "{serial}" was marked as revoked on { revoked_on, date, short } with reason: ({reason_code}) {reason}.
trans-unit.target: The certificate with serial-number "{serial}" was marked as revoked on { revoked_on, date, short } with reason: ({reason_code}) {reason}.

trans-unit.source: The certificate with common-name "{common_name}" contains a CA extension. Expected a leaf certificate.
trans-unit.target: The certificate with common-name "{common_name}" contains a CA extension. Expected a leaf certificate.

trans-unit.source: Certificate with common-name "{common_name}" does not contain required CA extension.
trans-unit.target: Certificate with common-name "{common_name}" does not contain required CA extension.

trans-unit.source: The certificate has expired on { expired_on, date, short }.
trans-unit.target: The certificate has expired on { expired_on, date, short }.

trans-unit.source: The certificate should support host pattern "{required_pattern}". But only the following patterns are supported: {supported}.
trans-unit.target: The certificate should support host pattern "{required_pattern}". But only the following patterns are supported: {supported}.

trans-unit.source: The certificate does not support the purpose: {required_purpose}.
trans-unit.target: The certificate does not support the purpose: {required_purpose}.

trans-unit.source: The certificate host "{provided}" contains an invalid global-wildcard pattern.
trans-unit.target: The certificate host "{provided}" contains an invalid global-wildcard pattern.

trans-unit.source: The certificate host "{provided}" contains an invalid public-suffix wildcard pattern "{suffix_pattern}".
trans-unit.target: The certificate host "{provided}" contains an invalid public-suffix wildcard pattern "{suffix_pattern}".

trans-unit.source: Unable to resolve the CA of certificate "{name}", issued by {parent}.
trans-unit.target: Unable to resolve the CA of certificate "{name}", issued by {parent}.

trans-unit.source: Too many CAs were provided. A maximum of 4 is accepted.
trans-unit.target: Too many CAs were provided. A maximum of 4 is accepted.

trans-unit.source: no specific reason was given
trans-unit.target: no specific reason was given

trans-unit.source: the private key associated with the certificate has been compromised
trans-unit.target: the private key associated with the certificate has been compromised

trans-unit.source: the CA's private key is has been compromised and is in the possession of an unauthorized individual
trans-unit.target: the CA's private key is has been compromised and is in the possession of an unauthorized individual

trans-unit.source: the user has terminated their relationship with the organization indicated in the Distinguished Name attribute of the certificate
trans-unit.target: the user has terminated their relationship with the organization indicated in the Distinguished Name attribute of the certificate

trans-unit.source: a replacement certificate has been issued to a user
trans-unit.target: a replacement certificate has been issued to a user

trans-unit.source: the CA is decommissioned, no longer to be used
trans-unit.target: the CA is decommissioned, no longer to be used

trans-unit.source: the certificate (public-key or attribute certificate) was revoked because a privilege contained within that certificate has been withdrawn
trans-unit.target: the certificate (public-key or attribute certificate) was revoked because a privilege contained within that certificate has been withdrawn

trans-unit.source: it is known or suspected that aspects of the AA validated in the attribute certificate have been compromised
trans-unit.target: it is known or suspected that aspects of the AA validated in the attribute certificate have been compromised
